activities:
Latitude Consulting Group (referenced hereafter as LCG) provides Web hosting, Website development and eCommerce services for a number of companies who have operations in EU countries.  Our primary role is provide those electronic services which our clients retain us for.  We receive human resource data and/or customer information pertaining to EU citizens either ONLINE via web based transaction processing or OFFLINE database transfers from our clients.  Included in our online discussion of Safe Harbor compliance, we present the following information to end-users.  
THE INFORMATION WE COLLECT AND HOW IT IS USED
1.   
Aggregate and Statistical Data
LCG collects certain aggregate data for general statistical information every time a site is visited.  This information is collected through server logs, and consists of:
 
ยง         
The dates and times of visits to the site
ยง         
The IP address of visitors to the site
ยง         
The visitor's computer operating system and browser version
 
This data is used as an aggregate to analyze system usage, peak usage times, and usage trends. This data is not used individually to identify site users.
 
2.       
Cookies
Sites created by LCG use cookies. Cookies are small data files that are transferred from a Web server to your browser.  This file contains information that may later be read back by the Web server for record keeping purposes.  Use of cookies is standard on the Web and can improve the service a Web site provides.  The information stored in cookies is not used to personally identify an individual, and does not contain personal information.  You may modify your browser to reject cookies or to notify you whenever a cookie is sent to your hard drive.  If you reject a cookie sent by LCG, your access to the site may be limited, or the site may no longer be accessible.
 
3.       
Personal Information Submitted by Users
All personally identifiable information received by LCG is voluntarily submitted by users or submitted on the users' behalf by our client companies. This information is only used by the specific client site for the intended purposes of that site.  Sites are designed to fulfill our clients' specific business needs by providing tools to facilitate Human Resources Management, Training Management, and Employee and Career Development.
